## FEATURES

# SCREEN 1

- start button

# SCREEN 2

- User name input
- Character Selection

# Screen 3

- Category selection
- difficulty selection (3 buttons)

# Screen 4

- Question
- Timer
- Progress bar
- 4 answer selection
- Name + Character

# Screen 5

- Name + Character
- score
- Gif
- Play again button
- Share
